Method.name: GET
Method.description: Shows the interface schema for a specified resource type. This schema describes the properties that can be set on the resource, their types, constraints, descriptions, and default values. Additionally, the resource attributes and their descriptions are provided.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Shows the template representation for a specified resource type. The returned template contains a single resource of the specified type. Each resource property is mapped to a template parameter and each resource attribute is mapped to a template output. These templates can be used as a starting place for created customized template-based resources or as examples of using the particular resource in another template.\n

Method.description: Creates a snapshot.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists summary information for all Block Storage snapshots that the tenant who submits the request can access.\n

Method.description: Updates a specified snapshot.\n

Method.name: DELETE
Method.description: Deletes a snapshot.\n

Method.name: GET

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists detailed information for all Block Storage snapshots that the tenant who submits the request can access.\n

Method.description: Creates a volume.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists summary information for all Block Storage volumes that the tenant who submits the request can access.\n

Method.description: Lists detailed information for all Block Storage volumes that the tenant who submits the request can access.\n

Method.description: Updates the name and description for a volume.\n

Method.name: DELETE
Method.description: Deletes a volume.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Shows volume details.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists volume types.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Shows volume type details.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Creates multiple ports in a single request. Specify a list of ports in the request body.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Retrieves list of ports to which the tenant has access.\n

Method.name: PUT
Method.description: Updates a specified port.\n

Method.name: DELETE
Method.description: Deletes a specified port.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Retrieves information for a specified port.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Resets the API key for a specified user.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Deletes account metadata.\n

Method.name: HEAD
Method.description: Gets account metadata.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Shows details for a specified account and lists containers, sorted by name, in the account.\n

Method.name: HEAD
Method.description: Shows container metadata, including the number of objects in the container and the total bytes for all objects stored in the container.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Shows details for a specified container and lists objects, sorted by name, in the container.\n

Method.name: PUT
Method.description: Creates a container.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Deletes container metadata.\n

Method.name: DELETE
Method.description: Deletes an empty container.\n

Method.name: HEAD
Method.description: Shows object metadata.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Gets the content and metadata for the object.\n

Method.name: PUT
Method.description: Using the `Destination` header, copies an existing object to another object with a new name in the Cloud Files storage system.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Sets or updates your object metadata. Metadata must be in the format `X-Object-Meta-name` where `name` is the name of your metadata. You can also assign `X-Delete-At` or `X-Delete-After` to expiring objects. You cannot use this operation to change other headers, such as `Content-Type`.\n

Method.name: DELETE
Method.description: Permanently deletes an object from the Cloud Files storage system. (You can use `COPY` and then `DELETE` to effectively move an object.)\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists CDN-enabled containers sorted by name.\n

Method.name: DELETE
Method.description: Deletes CDN-enabled objects.\n

Method.name: PUT
Method.description: Enables or disables a container for use with the CDN.\n

Method.name: HEAD
Method.description: Gets a CDN-enabled container's metadata.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Updates the CDN-enabled container's metadata.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Creates a load balancer with the configuration defined by the request.\n

Method.name: DELETE
Method.description: Bulk-deletes load balancers.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists load balancers that are configured for the account.\n

Method.name: PUT
Method.description: Updates the properties for a specified load balancer.\n

Method.name: DELETE
Method.description: Deletes a load balancer from the account.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Shows details for a specified load balancer.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Adds virtual IP version 6.\n

Method.name: DELETE
Method.description: Bulk-deletes specified virtual IPs.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists virtual IPs that are associated with a specified load balancer.\n

Method.name: DELETE

Method.description: Adds a metadata item to the load balancer.\n

Method.name: DELETE
Method.description: Bulk-deletes the metadata items given specified id list.\n

Method.name: GET

Method.name: PUT

Method.name: DELETE

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Shows details for a specified metadata item for a specified load balancer.\n

Method.name: DELETE

Method.name: GET

Method.description: Adds a credential to a user.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: List credentials.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Enables or disables an agent. Disabling an agent does not delete it or its data. You can re-enable disabled agents later.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Immediately permanently deletes an agent and its backup data.\n

Method.name: PUT
Method.description: Migrates a backup vault from one machine agent to another.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Changes the encryption password.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Enables volume encryption.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Updates the backup data center, or enables or disables ServiceNet for the Cloud Backup agent, or both.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists details about the machine and its agent.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists details about the machine and its agent using the host server ID.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Wakes up the agent before you perform tasks.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Retrieves information for all agents for the current user.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists all activity completed or in-progress for the user.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Manually starts or stops a backup. Returns the identifier of the instance of the backup.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists details about the specified backup.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists the backups that are eligible for restore (a backup that has completed at least once and has not been deleted and is not expired).\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists the details for backups that can still be restored.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Gets details about a completed backup.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists all in-progress and completed activity for an agent. Activity types are Backup, Cleanup, and Restore.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Creates a backup configuration for the authenticated user. Returns details of a backup configuration.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists all backup configurations for the current user.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Enables or disables a backup configuration.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists the backup configurations for the specified agent.\n

Method.name: PUT
Method.description: Updates an existing backup configuration.\n

Method.name: DELETE
Method.description: Deletes the specified backup configuration.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists detailed information for the specified backup configuration.\n

Method.name: PUT
Method.description: Creates a new restore configuration and returns detailed information about the restore.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Updates an existing restore configuration.\n

Method.name: POST
Method.description: Manually starts or stops a restore.\n

Method.name: PUT
Method.description: Creates a restore file associated with a restore.\n

Method.name: DELETE
Method.description: Deletes a restore configuration file.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists files that are included or excluded in a restore.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Lists details about the specified restore.\n

Method.name: GET
Method.description: Gets a report for the specified, completed restore.\n
